About This Game

XVIII century , North America . Amidst the chaos and violence of the North American seven-year war and the brave young assassin Shay Patrick Cormack subjected to ideological metamorphosis . After a dangerous mission that ends in tragedy , Shay was disappointed in the Order of the Assassins and do not wish to be in their fraternity. Subjected to grave danger and rejected by those he once thought were my brothers , Shay Patrick Cormack goes in a completely new adventure. Destroying all those who had betrayed him , he becomes one of the most dangerous hunters Assassins . Assassin's Creed Outcast - is the darkest chapter in the history of Assassin's Creed. Witness the transformation of the protagonist of Assassin staunch a cruel hunter them. Follow your own credit and go on an exciting journey across the expanses of North America, New York neighborhoods , valleys, rushing rivers and cold Atlantic waters . Now your goal - to destroy the Assassins !
